p.k: During Chefapalooza in the Rocky Montains three famous chefs and infamous bad-guys The Tri-Chefta hunt down Wildvine in hopes of creating their most exotic dish to date. / No one believes Ben when he insists that one of the other patrons waiting on line at the World of Wet Water Park is the nefarious Frightwig disguised as a common girl. / During a book signing at a medieval castle, Ben must stop Hex from getting his hands on a grimoire that can fuse its user with mythical beasts, creating monstrous hybrids! / Ben goes Upgrade to get a better signal to watch his favourite show Xingo but the titular Xingo leaps from his animated dimension to ours – bringing mad chaos with him! / After the Rust Bucket breaks down at a Mobile Home Park, Ben discovers they’ve stumbled on to the last leg of the Cali 10 Hundred, an epic off-road auto race.
